segments.text: How do I order the office supplies that I need ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fill out this form with whatever you need . What do you need the most ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can get a few of them right away , but might have to order some .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can wait a few days for these items .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Make sure that you have money allocated for these supplies . How much do you have for office supplies ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't think we have very much money for supplies , but we have a little .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like them delivered to you or can you come get them here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When you finish completing the request form , we will order and let you know when the supplies are here . Have a great day !
segments.speaker: S2
